replies.body: Has yours been freezing after champion select?  I can't even get in game.

I've seen this reported a few times, and it might be caused by some bad game files.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a force repatch to get that fixed up!  Let me know if you have any questions!
